segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and I just want to scream at her to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so careless, just standing there while the floor gets ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids are being sneaky, and it’s making me furious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it’s all because no one is watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as bad, encouraging him to do something dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should be paying more attention to what’s happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and she’s just going to slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a complete mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s going on before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The light from the window is so bright, but it’s like she’s blind to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR
